See also Figure 5.

question.title: What is the primary characteristic of urticaria?
question.description: A medical condition characterized by itchy, raised patches on the skin

option_a.title: Itchy, raised patches on the skin

option_b.title: A chronic autoimmune disorder
option_b.description: Characterized by inflammation of the joints

option_c.title: A type of skin cancer
option_c.description: Caused by exposure to UV radiation

option_d.title: A genetic disorder affecting the skin
option_d.description: Caused by a mutation in the COL3A1 gene
